title: Simple and Intuitive Setup for ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want a straightforward installation and configuration process for ALFRED so that I can easily set it up without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Privacy and Security of Personal Health Information
summary: As an older adult, I want to ensure that my personal health information is secure and only accessible by authorized individuals, so that I can feel safe using ALFRED without worrying about my privacy.

title: User-Friendly Accessibility Features for Older Adults
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to have user-friendly accessibility features so that I can easily navigate and use the system without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User Interface Tailored to Individual Abilities
summary: As an older adult, I want the ALFRED system to have a user-friendly interface that accommodates my mobility and cognitive limitations so that I can easily navigate and interact with the system without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Seamless Health and Communication Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate seamlessly with my health monitoring devices and communication tools so that I can efficiently manage my health and stay connected with my family without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Privacy Control for Personal Data Sharing
summary: As an older adult, I want to have clear control over what personal data is shared with ALFRED so that I can feel secure and maintain my privacy while using the system.

title: Simplified Onboarding Process
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a simple and guided onboarding process so that I can easily set up and start using ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed by technology.
